com.ppdai.tutorial

类 Deck<T,T2 extends Card<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ppdai.tutorial.Deck<T,T2>
  • 类型参数:
    T - The Type of the Cards
    T2 - com.ppdai.tutorial.Card Class of some chosen type
    直接已知子类:
    EmperorsDeck, FateDeck, PlebeiansDeck

    public abstract class Deck<T,T2 extends Card<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
    com.ppdai.tutorial.Deck for a generic type of cards

      • discardStack

        protected java.util.Stack<T2 extends Card<T>> discardStack

        public java.util.Stack<T2 extends Card<T>> drawingStack

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Deck

        public Deck(java.lang.String name)
        com.ppdai.tutorial.Deck Constructor.

        Creates a Discard Stack and Drawing Stack with initially zero cards inside both.

        参数:
        name - The title or description of this deck

    • 方法详细资料

      • populateDeck

        public abstract void populateDeck()
        Add cards to the Stack to ensure the deck has some cards to use for play.

      • drawCard

        public T drawCard()
        Draw a card from the Drawing Stack if there is a card to draw. If one is not available, the Discard Stack is popped completely into the Drawing Stack, and the Drawing Stack is shuffled. A card is then drawn.

        Before this card's value is returned by the method, the card is first pushed onto the top of the Discard Stack.

        返回:
        The value of the top card of the drawingStack

      • shuffleDeck

        public void shuffleDeck()
        Shuffle the drawingStack

      • resetDeck

        public void resetDeck()
        Push all of the cards in the Discard Stack onto the Drawing Stack and shuffle

      • destroyDeck

        public void destroyDeck()
        Remove all cards from both card Stacks
